languages.text: "Теодора фон Валанциус, как и Тисифона, не была святой. Но это не значит, что мы не в силах исправить ошибки предков".

traits.locale_text: "Теодора фон Валанциус, как и Тисифона, не была святой. Но это не значит, что мы не в силах испраивть ошибки предков".

languages.text: "Neither Theodora von Valancius nor Tisiphone was infallible. But that doesn't mean we are powerless to rectify the errors of our ancestors."
languages.original_text: "Теодора фон Валанциус, как и Тисифона, не была святой. Но это не значит, что мы не в силах исправить ошибки предков".

traits.locale_text: "Neither Theodora von Valancius nor Tisiphone were saints. But that doesn't mean we are powerless to correct the errors of our ancestors."
"Neither Theodora von Valancius nor Tisiphone were saints. But that doesn't mean we are powerless to correct the errors of our ancestors."
"Neither Theodora von Valancius nor Tisiphone were infallible. But that doesn't mean we are powerless to rectify the errors of our ancestors."
"Neither Theodora von Valancius nor Tisiphone were infallible. But that doesn't mean we are powerless to rectify the errors of our ancestors."
"Neither Theodora von Valancius nor Tisiphone was infallible. But that doesn't mean we are powerless to rectify the errors of our ancestors."
"Neither Theodora von Valancius nor Tisiphone was infallible. But that doesn't mean we are powerless to rectify the errors of our ancestors."

languages.text: 「シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスもティシフォンも過ちを犯さないということはなかった。だが、私たちには父祖の過ちを正す力がないとい決まったわけではない」
languages.original_text: "Neither Theodora von Valancius nor Tisiphone was infallible. But that doesn't mean we are powerless to rectify the errors of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスもティシフォンも過ちを犯さないということはなかった。だが、私たちには父祖の過ちを正す力がないとい決まったわけではない」

languages.text: “无论是西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯，还是提西福涅·奥赛罗，都不是完美的圣人。但即便如此，我们依然有能力弥补我们的先人犯下的错误。”
languages.original_text: "Neither Theodora von Valancius nor Tisiphone was infallible. But that doesn't mean we are powerless to rectify the errors of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: “无论是西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯，还是提西福涅·奥赛罗，都不是完美的圣人。但即便如此，我们依然有能力弥补我们的先人犯下的错误。”

languages.text: « Théodora von Valancius et Tisiphone étaient loin d'être des saintes, mais cela ne signifie pas pour autant que nous ne pouvons pas racheter les erreurs de nos ancêtres. »
languages.original_text: "Neither Theodora von Valancius nor Tisiphone was infallible. But that doesn't mean we are powerless to rectify the errors of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: « Théodora von Valancius et Tisiphone étaient loin d'être des saintes, mais cela ne signifie pas pour autant que nous ne pouvons pas racheter les erreurs de nos ancêtres. »

languages.text: «Ni Theodora von Valancius ni Tisiphone eran infalibles, pero eso no significa que no podamos rectificar los errores de nuestros antepasados».
languages.original_text: "Neither Theodora von Valancius nor Tisiphone was infallible. But that doesn't mean we are powerless to rectify the errors of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: «Ni Theodora von Valancius ni Tisiphone eran infalibles, pero eso no significa que no podamos rectificar los errores de nuestros antepasados».

languages.text: "Weder Theodora von Valancius noch Tisiphone waren unfehlbar. Das heißt jedoch nicht, dass wir machtlos sind, die Fehler unserer Ahnen zu korrigieren."
languages.original_text: "Neither Theodora von Valancius nor Tisiphone was infallible. But that doesn't mean we are powerless to rectify the errors of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: "Weder Theodora von Valancius noch Tisiphone waren unfehlbar. Das heißt jedoch nicht, dass wir machtlos sind, die Fehler unserer Ahnen zu korrigieren."

languages.text: "Ne Theodora von Valancius ne de Tisiphone şaşmaz değildir. Yine de atalarımızın hatalarını düzeltme gücüne sahibiz."
languages.original_text: "Neither Theodora von Valancius nor Tisiphone was infallible. But that doesn't mean we are powerless to rectify the errors of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: "Ne Theodora von Valancius ne de Tisiphone şaşmaz değildir. Yine de atalarımızın hatalarını düzeltme gücüne sahibiz."
